description: This file defines a mock class ServiceMock that inherits from WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell. It uses Google Mock to create mocked methods for unit testing, representing the interface of a service or plugin in the WPEFramework. The class provides function signatures for numerous service-related methods, such as versioning, paths, and lifecycle management.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported based on the given parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the subsystem interface.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with given parameters.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with given strings.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by callsign and ID.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if the service runs in background.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Performs substitution in the input string.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets configuration line with a string.

methods.name: SystemRootPath (with parameter)
methods.description: Sets or gets the system root path based on the parameter.

methods.name: Resumed (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets or gets the resumed state.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Sets the service to hibernate with a reason.
